gold.user: User requests to retrieve all code security configurations for their enterprise to review current settings.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of configurations with details such as configuration ID, name, and status.

gold.user: User wants to create a new code security configuration for their enterprise to enhance security measures.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new configuration and returns the configuration ID and details.

gold.user: User needs to check the default code security configurations set for their enterprise.
gold.ideal: Returns the default configurations with their respective settings and statuses.

gold.user: User is looking for details on a specific code security configuration identified by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified configuration including its settings and status.

gold.user: User wants to update the settings of an existing code security configuration to improve security.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the configuration and returns the updated configuration details.

gold.user: User decides to delete a specific code security configuration that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the configuration and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: User wants to attach an existing configuration to a specific enterprise setup.
gold.ideal: Successfully attaches the configuration and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: User wants to set a specific configuration as the default for their enterprise.
gold.ideal: Successfully sets the configuration as default and returns the updated status.

gold.user: User needs to see which repositories are associated with a specific configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of repositories linked to the specified configuration.
